Kaze Hikaru is a wonderfully told story, it's soooo
good with the history that you've really got to hand
it to "Maruko-sensei" (Watanabe Taeko's nickname) for
doing her research. Then again, I have the added
advantage of being Japanese. 

And I LOVE Saitou in it too! 

--- secretary <secretarytocapt3@...> wrote:


---------------------------------
I LOVE Kaze Hikaru Saitou...he's just so cute and
cuddly.

I can't believe I just said that.
